Hotels.title: Ville Des Roses Hotel
Hotels.description: Majestic peaks, tranquil lakes. Popular for hiking, nature enthusiasts, rich biodiversity.

Hotels.title: KT Hotel
Hotels.description: Tallest mountain on Earth, known for its challenging climbs and breathtaking views.

Hotels.title: BN Hotel
Hotels.description: Iconic natural wonder, famous for its layered bands of red rock revealing millions of years of geological history.

Hotels.title: Aurassi Hotel
Hotels.description: World's largest coral reef system, home to a diverse array of marine life and a popular destination for snorkeling and diving.
